name: Headless JEFF-3 (Insanity CORR)
description:
Play as a headless robot named JEFF-3 on a chaotic adventure through dangerous gauntlets, complex puzzles, and harsh adversities, all from the perspective of your detached head!

Explore the vast confines of the abandoned Industrial Megacenter, crash through bizarre obstacles, solve mind-boggling problems, and overcome head-twisting laws of physics as you stumble towards your goal in this action-packed "2nd-person perspective" puzzle adventure!

Erase what you know about perspective and prepare for hilarious failures in your quest to get your head on straight!
